title: A Take On How To Fund Federal Highway Projects
teaser: Unless Congress agrees to an extension , the law that authorizes federal highway spending is set to expire this Sunday. Further, the Highway Trust Fund will be insolvent later this year. John Munsonâ€™s guest policy expert discusses his plan to sufficiently fund the account while encouraging passage of tax reform .
